page.title: 13NURSERIES
page.content: There are 24 glass house nurseries in this area.They mainly grow tomatoes,lettuce and celery.They are in this area because the weather is suitable.Heating is by water or gas.The flowers that are grown are carnations,lillies,iris,chrysanthemum, roses,alstromerial and many bedding or pot plants.They are sold in markets all over England,some are exported and many are sold in local shops.White fly,green fly,bitpytis,white rust thrips and spider might affect the plants.These are controlled by Malathios,pyrethrin and numerous other chemicals or biological methods.There are more woman than men who now work in the nurseries. By Chris Smith and David Stow.
